## As easy as HTML

<section class="columns">
  <div>

Our components are just HTML elements. You can use them anywhere you can use HTML!

```html
<previewbox-link href="https://web-highlights.com">
</previewbox-link>
```

  </div>
  <div>

<previewbox-link href="https://web-highlights.com">
</previewbox-link>

  </div>
</section>
